WHAT IS THIS

Hello my dudes, I'm Daria. If you're here on this website' it probably means that a) I pestered you long enough on social media for you to give up and go "Ugh okay I'll give it a look just stop talking" and it that case thank you for this heart-warming display of friendship, or b) that you arrived here by accident, in which case I would suggest to run before it's too late and re-examinate your life choices.

But I can already see, the undying wish for you to know the answer to this gut-wrenching question : "What the hell will I find here ?". Well, apart from a seizure-inducing design and color choice that will make you question my sanity, you'll be able to listen to my attempts at making music. Give it a shot, I promise it's not that bad. Or maybe it is, I'll let you judge, just don't hurt my feelings okay I'm a sensitive human being, just like you. Except probably a little dumber.

But before risking filling your ears with audio-vomit, you might want to know what kind of music this is. Well, to name a few of my influences I'd say bands like Slowdive, Downy, Blonde Redhead, Sleep Dealer, Mono, My Bloody Valentine, Radiohead, Muse, Portishead, Acidman. To be honest anything that flirts with post rock / shogaze / dreampop / late 90's emo music will probably get my mojo going. If nothing in this rings a bell, just try to picture what a sad teenager in the 90's would've listened to. Yeah, I'm THAT cliché.

In any case if you like what you see/hear, please leave a like, subscribe and donate to my patreon. Oh wait I don't have a facebook page. Or a Youtube Channel. Or a Patreon. What am I doing with my life again ?

And most importantly, don't forget : "Love To Hate yourself" and "If you ever feel any emotion, of any kind, or are seeking happiness instead of crippling depression, you're doing something wrong."
